The more Straight Shot stayed with Perceptor, and worked with him, she coul=
d see something in him that was far different than the others.  The fact th=
at he cared deeply for Rodimus and was willing to even work with the Autobo=
ts and Maximals to try and retrieve him.  Even in the throws of confrontati=
on, she couldn't help but put a gentile hand on his shoulder, being careful=
 not to be too rough.  She gives him a re assuring smile.

"Don't worry Per=
ceptor, where there's a will there's a way.  We'll find Rodimus, I know we =
will."
